snippet: The softball team of Dewey & LeBoeuf, the behemoth firm that went bankrupt this year, is 10-1 and is defending its league championship from last season, Elizabeth A. Harris reported for The New York Times.
abstract: The softball team of Dewey & LeBoeuf, the behemoth firm that went bankrupt this year, is 10-1 and is defending its league championship from last season, Elizabeth A. Harris reported for The New York Times.

headline.main: Defunct Law Firm Keeps Its Troubles Off the Softball Field
